name: Escape Velocity (BathrobeWizard, aokay, Steven)
description:
Can you escape the ever growing black hole? Made for Godot wild jam 38!

Controls (rebindable using P):

    - down arrow: slide 

    - space: jump

    - right: to speed up!

    - left: slow down :(

    -hold left and right: super charge your speed (Caution! prevents jumping)

You can jump higher if you hold down first, and you can charge up speed if you press and hold the left and right simultaneously.

Creators:

    - Steven: Art & Design

    - Aokay: Theme and SFX

    - Helix: Programming & Design

    - BathrobeWizard: Programming & Design
